title: Lagging
body: Lately, my pings has been jumping like.. 400pings back down to 50 ping then up to 400 pings..everything else is fine like youtube,google ect. Riot needs to fix their servers..  (english not my first language)

replies.body: I'm having the same issue and can't find a resolution, riot please help us out.
I FEEL YOUR PAIN, i have been experiencing the same issues i want to know whats happening its affecting my games
